summary: \'Adds\'  a dragon at bleak falls barrow....
descriptionHtml:
Description
This makes the dragon at bleak falls barrow accesible immediatly.

Installation
Just put it in your data folder.

WARNING!
This mod makes a high level fire dragon availibe at bleak falls barrow from the start of the game, if you kill him before you have your first dragon fight you will almost certainly screw up your game. Furthermore this dragon is NOT kidding around.I went there with a level 10 nord in heavy armor only to be turned to ash.
This is only a placeholder while i work at making him more evenly leveled.

How?
All I did was click on the dragon at Bleak Falls Barrow and click \"initialy disabled\" off. Not rocket science.
author: Eddieawsome
